name: devfest-ai-blocks
description: Modular AI Block Marketplace with Flowglad

scripts.dev: npm run build -w shared && concurrently "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install -w frontend && npm install -w backend
